많은 분들의 고민!
피부에 깊은 보습감을 부여하면서 끈적이지 않고
오래 지속 되는 제품 어디 없을까요?🧴

마몽드가 2021년 새로 출시한 제품,
여러분의 고민을 덜어드릴 수 있는
프로바이오틱스* 세라마이드 크림 & 가든 핸드크림을 공유해드려요🌿

🎈마몽드 프로바이오틱스 세라마이드
7겹의 고밀도 세라마이드로 촘촘탄탄한 보습장벽을 완성하고,
흔들림 없는 건강 장벽을 만들어 365일 건강한 피부로 유지✨

🎈마몽드 가든 핸드크림 
오랜시간 지속 되는 깊은 보습감은 물론,
마몽드 가든의 향이 가득 담겨 풍성한 향이 오래 지속✨

곧 다가오는 봄을 맞이하여
산뜻한 피부 보습을 위해 함께 관리해보아요💫
 #마몽드 #Mamonde
#프로바이오틱스크림 #이중장벽크림 #Probioticscream
#마몽드핸드크림 #가든핸드크림 #gardenhandcream,#FlowerDiscovery

다가오는 환절기 기간에 내 피부에 필요한 것은?
피부 속 강화된 장벽 보호 능력✨

마몽드의 NEW 프로바이오틱스 세라마이드는
여러분의 피부가 365일 건강한 피부로
유지될 수 있도록 장벽 보호 능력을 높여 피부의 힘을 길러줍니다 !

🙋🏻‍♀️Q.모든 세라마이드 크림, 답답한 마무리감 아닌가요?
➡️부드러운 요거트 크림 제형으로 답답하지 않고, 
    속보습을 꽉! 잡아 산뜻한 장벽막을 선사해줍니다.
 🙋🏻‍♀️Q.화장전에 사용해도 괜찮은가요?
➡️ 화장전에 발라도 밀림이 없고 빠른 흡수력을 자랑한답니다.

또한, 모든 피부에 적합한 텍스쳐로
여름에도 끈적임이 없는 마무리감을 가지고 있어요🌿

차세대 세라마이드 등장!
바를 수록 건강해지는 7겹의 고밀도 세라마이드로
촘촘탄탄한 피부 장벽 만들어보아요💛
 #마몽드 #프로바이오틱스크림 #이중장벽크림
#Mamonde #probioticscream,#BlossomingLife

겨울 하늘에서 따스하게 비춰준 햇살에
곧게 뻗어 자란 자작나무를 감상하고 가세요!✨

꽃이 잠든 겨울에도 화려한 흰색으로 빛나는 겨울의 자작나무는
4월이면 꽃이 피는 나무 중 하나라는 사실! 알고 계셨나요?

추운 겨울에는 하얗고 아름답게 보내며 견뎌내고,
봄에는 아름다운 꽃피워내는 자작나무의 모습을 닮아
올 한해도 마몽드는 여러분이 멋진
#BlossomingLife 를 즐기실 수 있도록 열심히 달려갈게요 🥰

여러분들의 일상 속 기다림 끝에 생기는 일들이
어떤 ‘꽃’과 닮으면 좋을지 댓글을 통해 공유해주세요!👇,#Welcome #Yerin

올 해 마몽드와 함께할 새로운 뮤즈💙

yerin_the_genuine
@bluevinyl.official 

꽃을 좋아하는 예린과 꽃덕 마몽드의 만남🌷

예린과 마몽드가 콜라보한 첫 제품이

예린님처럼 탄탄한 기본기를 갖춘 신제품이라던데,
저만 기대하고 있는건 아니겠죠? 🙌🏼

예린과 마몽드가 콜라보한 첫 제품,

마몽드 가든에 놀러온 뮤즈🌷
그녀는 누구일까요?

🌸Flowers have Blossomed,
🌸so have We

여러분은 어떤 분을 예상하시나요?
댓글을 통해 정답을 맞춰주세요!

#마몽드 #뮤즈
#Mamonde #Muse,#BlossomingBeauty
여러분들의 손 컨디션은 어떤가요?🤔
피부 트러블에 신경쓰기 바빠 손 피부 컨디션에 신경쓰기 어려웠던 요즘!

일상생활에 촉촉함은 물론, 마몽드 가든의 향이 오랜시간 지속되는 
#마몽드가든핸드크림 으로 블라써밍 뷰티를 즐겨보는건 어떨까요?✨

✔️마몽드의 대표 꽃 5종과 꿀 추출물, 핵심성분 블라써밍 에너지™
✔️오랜 시간 지속되는 마몽드 가든의 향
✔️쉐어버터 함유로 깊은 보습감 부여

피부 보습을 유지하고, 첫향은 상큼한 열매향으로 시작되어
장미와 작약의 풍성한 향을 풍성하고 오래 지속되는 
#마몽드가든핸드크림 으로 산뜻한 봄을 맞이하는
나만의 가든을 상상해보세요🌿🕊

#마몽드 #마몽드핸드크림 #가든핸드크림 
#Mamonde #GardenHandcream,#BlossomingBeauty
건조한 겨울철 어려운 손 보습관리!🧴

오랜 시간 깊은 보습감이 유지 되는 것과 동시에
가든에서 산책하는 것과 같은 향이 더해진다면
산뜻한 봄과 같은 피부 보습감이 유지되지 않을까요?

마몽드 가든 핸드크림은 나만의 가든을 그리며
산뜻한 봄을 맞이 할 수 있는 상상을 불러일으켜요✨
여러분의 상상 속 마몽드 가든은 어떤 모습인가요?

따스한 봄이 그려지는 마몽드 핸드크림이
기대된다면 댓글로 하트를 남겨주세요! ❤️

마몽드 가든을 통으로 담은 #마몽드가든핸드크림 은
올 봄에만 만나볼 수 있답니다🌷

#마몽드 #마몽드핸드크림 #가든핸드크림 #마몽드가든에서의산책
#Mamonde #GardenHandcream #strollinspringmamondegarden,#FromGarden
겨울의 끝자락이 다가올듯 한 요즘-
따뜻한 햇빛이 내리쬐는 봄을 기다리면서도,
겨울만이 전해주는 아름다움을 보내기 아쉬워요❄️
마몽드는 올 봄에만 만나보실 수 있는
핸드크림을 준비하며 겨울을 보냈는데요!

나만의 가든을 그리며 산뜻한 봄을 맞이할 수 있도록
열심히 달려 왔답니다☺️

소복하게 쌓이는 눈이 감성을 자극했던 올해 겨울🌨
여러분들께 이번 겨울 동안 가장 기억에 남는 순간은 언제인가요?
댓글로 함께 공유해주세요✨

#마몽드 #아모레퍼시픽식물원 #마몽드핸드크림 #가든핸드크림
#Mamonde #AmorepacificGarden #GardenHandcream

Bio:
👩‍🔬Farmacéutica/ Ana Ordis
🧴Una fórmula para cada cliente
📝 Rellena el cuestionario antes de realizar el pedido ⬇️
Caption text:
¿Caída capilar? ¿Sequedad? ¿Picores? 

☝️ Te ayudamos a poner solución a tus problemas capilares con nuestro servicio de análisis capilar y nuestra loción de Capilia Longa. Vas a alucinar con los resultados, ¡te lo aseguramos!

Si tienes síntomas como picor, caspa, exceso de grasa, sequedad o pérdida de cabello, no dudes en pedir tu cita online, telefónica o presencial y te realizaremos un diagnóstico capilar.✍️

▶ ️ Analizamos tu cuero cabelludo y te ayudamos a encontrar el tratamiento que más se adapta a tus necesidades.

Si necesitas ➕ información, consúltanos en la farmacia o llámanos al 📲 663433914.

 ¡Lucir un cabello increíble es muy fácil! 🤗

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #cuidadofacial #diagnosticocapilar #caidacapilar #problemascapilares #analisicapilar,¡Alerta!🚨 Hoy en día estamos más expuestos que nunca a las pantallas y, en consecuencia, al envejecimiento cronológico o contaminación digital. 💻

☝🏼¿Sabías que los rayos ⚡ cargados de energía de la luz azul penetran también en la piel? Provocan la estimulación de radicales libres y rompen las estructuras celulares a largo plazo. ⚠️Resultado⚠️: aparición de manchas y aceleración del proceso de envejecimiento. 

✅ Por eso te proponemos restaurar la capacidad adaptativa de la piel para superar el estrés hipoxico y falta de oxígeno, con el activo de protector de la luz azul. 💪🏼 Este ingrediente activo, derivado de la flor de Nasturtium, también limita la aparición de radicales libres y el daño a la matriz causado por esta luz.

Además, proporciona una verdadera ráfaga de oxígeno, fortalece la función de barrera, suaviza la textura de la piel, mejorando así su calidad.

😇OBJETIVO: piel más saludable y efecto glow.

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #cuidadofacial #luzazul #envejecimientocelular #envejecimientodigital #proteccionluzazul,¿Pensando en mejorar el aspecto de tu piel?👀 Si aún no has probado el Tónico Gluconolactona, ¡te encantará! 🤩🤩

✔️ Tratamiento calmante
✔️ Exfoliante suave
✔️ Hidratante 
✔️ Antienvejecimiento
✔️ Antiinflamación
✔️ Calmante de picores

💎¡Apuesta por una renovación celular!💎

Modo de empleo: se aplica 🌞día y noche🌜. Apto para todas las pieles.

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #cuidadofacial #aspectopiel #pielsaludable #tonicogluconolactona #tonicofacial,🥵¿Cansad@ de llagas en la boca?, ¿por qué me salen tan a menudo?

✍🏻 Las aftas son ulceraciones que aparecen en la mucosa bucal, tanto en los labios como en la cavidad bucal, que generalmente se curan por si solas en 7-10 días. No suelen ser graves, pero pueden llegar a ser muy molestas, pues provocan sensación de dolor y ardor. En la garganta, ¡son muy dolorosas!🚨

☝🏻Pueden aparecer por distintos motivos: alteración nerviosa, anemia, celiaquía, alteraciones del sistema inmunitario, la toma de algunos fármacos, entre otros.

Nuestros consejos:
➡️ Evitar alimentos muy ácidos o muy salados.
➡️ Evitar comidas muy calientes.
➡️ Extremar la higiene bucal mientras haya aftas para evitar infecciones.
➡️ Emplear colutorios a base de Clorhexidina.
➡️ Utilizar gel de hialurónico especifico para aftas: repara y calma.
➡️ Utilizar própolis para los más pequeños de casa.

Y recuerda, si son recurrentes, te recomendamos acudir al médico.

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #cuidadobucal #saludbucal #aftas #llagasbucales,⚡¡Tenemos la solución para combatir el acné!⚡

Nuestro Sérum de Ácido Hyalurónico, a base de prebióticos, controla y protege la microbiota. ¡Fantástico!, ¿verdad? 💪🏻

Además, contiene:
👉🏼 Nicotinamida, incrementa el crecimiento celular, antiinflamatorio, con derivado de Vit A.
👉🏼 Zinc, sulfato anti-seborreico.
👉🏼 Extracto de Sauce, salicílico y un anti-inflamatorio natural y antioxidante con Terminalia Fernandiana.
👉🏼 Fruit Extract, protege del estrés oxidativo y aporta luminosidad.

📌Modo de empleo: ⏱️ aplicar cada día, 💧tres gotas 🌞mañana y 🌙noche después de la limpieza.

🤩Resultados a los 28 días de su correcta aplicación.

¡Consúltanos!

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #acne #problemasacne #rutinafacialacne,Hoy, en el 💕 Día Internacional del Niñ@ con Cáncer, os dejamos nuevo post en el blog donde os hablaremos sobre los cuidados dermo-cosméticos en oncología.

👉🏼 Recordad que un buen cuidado preventivo en la piel en este tipo de pacientes hará que tenga mejor calidad de vida.

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #cuidadopiel #cuidadooncologiapiel #cuidadocancer,👉🏼 ¿Cómo te aplicas el contorno de ojos? 👁️ ¡Sigue leyendo! 👇🏻

✅ El contorno de ojos es uno de los cosméticos, junto con los sérums, que más preparamos y dispensamos en #cosmeticamedida.

📝 Se utilizan para combatir las arrugas, las ojeras, las bolsas, entre otros.

✍🏻 Modo de empleo:
- Limpia bien la zona donde te aplicarás el contorno.
- Aplica una porción del tamaño de un grano de arroz en cada ojo, a toques con el dedo anular, desde el lagrimal hasta las denominadas ""patas de gallo"" y hacia la zona ósea del párpado inferior. Evita arrastrar el producto. 
- Solamente aplícalo en todo el contorno si el fabricante lo indica.

#CosmeticaMedida #FarmaciaAnaOrdis #farmaciaCerdanyola #saludCerdanyola #equipocosmeticamedida #contornoojos #bellezaojos,¡Prueba ya nuestro contorno de ojos 👁️ para pieles sensibles y con eccemas!

⁣

⁠No purchase necessary! This giveaway is in no way sponsored or affiliated with Instagram.,Throwback Thursdays are still a thing right?

Swipe to see where we started. Now we have all new packaging that sits so pretty in any #ChellaBella or #ChellaFellas makeup bag. 

Did someone say level up? 🙌🏽,Wear it Wednesday🎀

There is nothing better than a soft glam to get you through the week!
Using the La Vie palette to create this stunning shimmery look @mariseeezy looks absolutely heaven sent☁️✨,When you’re on the go it’s important to be prepared. For us, prepared means having a whole lotta Chella on deck! 

We’ve got all the essentials:
🌟La Vie: Travel & Full Sized
🌟Lush Balm
🌟Eyebrow Pencil Kit
🌟Eyebrow Cream
🌟Eyeliner pen

What Chella products travel with you?🌎,@_itscera giving us gorgeous full brows with the help of the Brow Minimalist Kit✨

Good brows shouldn’t be hard & we want to make it simple. With the Chella Eyebrow Pencil & the Chella Clear Defining Brow Gel, we’ve got you covered. 

It really is that simple!🎀,Sometimes in the waves of change, we find our true direction🌊

It’s #SelfcareSunday, and we want our #ChellaBellas & #ChellaFellas to know that it’s okay to feel a little lost or discouraged sometimes. This year has been full of insane transformation & uncertainty, but the good news is that with change we are given the opportunity to grow! 💞

In case you need to hear it today, you are exactly where you need to be & we are proud of you✨,There are a million reasons to love La Vie...but our favorite is how it accentuates everyone’s beauty. 

Four stunning shades that go above and beyond, shining bright on every skin tone!✨
La Vie is highly pigmented, blendable, and NEVER lacks luster💞

Femme, Instincts, Dynamic, and Vitality… Which shade is your favorite?👇🏽💫,This is your reminder to do something for yourself today 🌸

☁️Make it a goal to include one hour a day doing something you want. It can be anything from working out 💪🏽 to taking a nap💤 

If it makes you happy do more of it!

We want to know, what makes your #ChellaBellas & #ChellasFellas happy?Tell us in the comments!

Caption text: Today’s hair slay. V painted ribbons of clay lightener with 35V. Glazed with 7N and 6NB Redken shades eq! ✨ @hairmeroar,One more because why not? Too many beautiful shots of this balayage to choose one! ✨ @hairmeroar,Bronde and beautiful! I’ll show you the start to finish and give the formula details in my reel tomorrow. Stay tuned. ✨ @hairmeroar,Teasylights. Rabia has a natural level 3 base so getting her nice and bright requires strategically placed, small section teasylights. I got to use the new 8VG series from Redken shades eq mixed with a little 8V for added coolness. I’m loving the new tone. Here is her 2.5 hour appointment from today. ✨ @hairmeroar,Here is a still shot from yesterday’s reel. Formula details: clay lightener with 35V and @brazilianbondbuilder, lowlights of 4N/3N Redken shades eq with precision processing solution. Glazed with 6NB and a pinch of 5G shades eq. ✨ @hairmeroar,Madeline: balayage highlights and lowlights with a shades eq glaze. Here is her 2.5 hour appointment in 30 seconds. ✨ @hairmeroar,Back that ASH up! ✨ Just an FYI: this was not balayage. This guest was prelightened already and was blonde before we created this melt. It’s very difficult to achieve this tone for brunettes with hair painting because of the underlying pigments that are exposed. This was all deposit of color over prelightened blonde hair. If you are a brunette who wants to achieve extreme cool tones, you need to be lifted lighter than your target level and toned darker. It’s still a high maintenance look, as the toners are not permanent. ✨ @hairmeroar,Here is the still shot from yesterday’s reel.. If you haven’t seen it yet, check it out. One post back! Her formula details: clay lightener with 35V and @brazilianbondbuilder, Schwarzkopf tbh 3-06 lowlight. Glazed with 5G with a splash of 4NB Redken shades eq. ✨ @hairmeroar,My signature look. Most of my clients request brunette balayage from me. I have honed my skills to focus on this niche in the market. I love brunettes. I find balancing warm tones extremely satisfying. Balayage highlights with lowlights and a beautiful toasty warm glaze... Pamela is killing it with her gorgeous hair. ✨ @hairmeroar,My friend Robyn (@robynlesliefinejewelry) comes all the way from Tenefly, New Jersey to have me do her hair every 8 weeks. The weather has been killing us lately here in CT but we made it work before the snow storm.  I retouch her base and add some very rooty teasylights for brightness around her face and on her ends. ✨ @hairmeroar

⁠,Clean, nontoxic beauty is more hyped than ever! ⁠
⁠
As many of us become more aware of what we put in our bodies - we also become more aware of what we put on our bodies. For us, the beauty world is multifaceted and everyone should adapt their routine to personal preferences. Is it your philosophy to avoid certain ingredients or does your skin not tolerate specific ones? ⁠
⁠
But what we all want is transparency and to know exactly the ingredients in our beauty products. With our Clean-Filter on niche-beauty.com we give you an orientation, because 'clean' means: free of the most criticized ingredients (justified or unjustified).⁠
⁠

⁠⁠
#nichebeauty #susannekaufmann #refill #beauty #skincare #refillsystem #sustainability #sustainablebeauty #recyclable,Spring is finally here! Nature is bursting with life everywhere you look and it feels exciting to shift into longer, warmer days. In preparation for the heady days of spring, you can now find all the perfect beauty essentials to update your skincare routine in our Spring Affair category on niche-beauty.com.⁠
⁠
#nichebeauty #springaffair #newedit #newin #spring #skincare #skincareroutine #beautyessentials #flawlessskin,Here are 6 tips to update your skincare routine for the upcoming spring season! After a week, your skin will be more balanced and you will feel amazing, promise!⁠
⁠
1. Take a break from starchy comfort foods and sweets to reset and recalibrate your body.⁠
2. SPF is your greatest weapon against aging skin and wrinkles! ⁠
3. Spring is the time to swap out the heavier creams and switch to a lighter moisturizer.⁠
4. Take a few minutes a day to gently massage your forehead, cheekbones, jawline and neck. Tools such as a Gua Sha can also very helpful for this!⁠
5. For oily skin on warmer days, a gently detoxifying toner mask will help!⁠
6. Exercise and increased blood circulation not only make beautiful skin, but also stimulate our digestive system.⁠
⁠
#nichebeauty #springaffair #springedit #skincare #skincareroutine #skincareripps #inspiration #motivation #treatyourself,NEW IN: @psaskin - the new unisex beauty brand, for every skintype, color and condition. Helping everyone's skin win ♥️⁠⁠
⁠⁠
The brand name stands for 'Purposeful Skincare by Allies'. But Allies is not just a word in it, it is an essential and proudly part of the label's LGBTQIA+ identity. Each person is unique and expressive. And in order to feel totally comfortable in one's own skin, the line offers a results-driven, universal and innovative skincare range. It is also about transparency and collaboration, because skin can only look as radiant as the ingredients it contains allow it to. That's why the formulas contain none of the common triggers and irritants that cause irritation and stress to the skin. Simply beautiful!⁠⁠
⁠⁠
#nichebeauty #psa #psaskincare #newbrand #newin #skincare #skincareroutine #unisex,New in & exclusive: The 'SCULPT Arm Compound' by @ubeauty!⁠⁠⁠

damage.⁠⁠

THE RESULT? Skin that’s less susceptible to the effects of gravity.⁠⁠

Sunday scaries? We don't know them. 🧖🏽‍♀️🛁🥥
How are you relaxing this weekend? 

📷@glowgetterglowbetter,"It’s Coco time🥥! This Coco Rose Coconut Oil Body Polish, or gommage pour les corps (sounds so fancy💁🏼‍♀️), from herbivorebotanicals was the perfect product to feature for today’s #watershotwednesday. I discovered it a couple of months ago online and immediately did some further research👩🏼‍💻. Of course I could not resist the temptation to try it out myself😻!

Is it vegan? YES✔️
Is it free from synthetic ingredients (dyes, fragrances and preservatives)? YES✔️
Is it free from irritants? YES✔️
Is it hydrating for my skin? YES✔️

So, what makes this so product hydrating? The intensively moisturising combination of softening shea butter (such an awesome ingredient) and virgin coconut oil (rich in fatty acids). An extraordinary addition to the formula is pink kaolin clay which gives it its rosy colour💕. This clay has detoxifying properties for the skin. 

I currently use it two times a week and noticed it is ideal for my dry winter skin❄️. The polish promotes blood circulation and regenerates the skin while also moisturising it. My skin is (this sounds like a marketing text, but I am telling the truth 😉) silky and smooth to the touch after using it🌹. I am so excited about this polish! I really recommend it and the scent of Moroccan rose and coconut are divine💆🏼‍♀️!

What is your favourite body polish? "
📷+ ✍️@skinlclaire,That first scoop 🤤
A delicious swirl of Coconut Milk, Organic Virgin Coconut Oil, and Sugar entices you with a subtle tropical scent. Exfoliating never smelled so good 🥥✨

📷@skincareofb,Watch as @therealteshamarie lets you in on her go-to skincare products:

"@herbivorebotanicals Pink Cloud Cleanser 💗 ☁️ This has EASILY become my favorite cleanser. Its very gentle but also somehow super effective when removing makeup. Doesn't strip my skin and leaves it feeling hydrated as a result
